title: Odyssey: Extraction is the most anti-fun experience I've had in this game in a while.
body:
Every aspect of this is anti-fun.

No Riot, getting pulled by skarner ults and dragged to a volcano is not fun.
No Riot, surrendering 20 seconds into the game after a 5 minute queue and loading screen because someone got the wrong number of augments is not fun.
No Riot, begging for a 4 augment run because you haven't done that mission yet and your team wants to go all 2 augments is not fun.
No Riot, grinding to unlock 15 augments for 5 champions and then having missions tell you to use 2 of them is not fun.
No Riot, having to use a third-party service or website to find teammates to play for the appropriate mission is not fun.

No Riot, this is not fun.

replies.body: Uhm dont play it if its not your cup of tea? I mean are you really complaining about an optional mode not being designed to cater to your personal taste?

sounds more like a "you" problem than a Riot problem.
I never felt I had to surrender. I just played through (sometimes with just a team of 4) and then tried again.
Getting the augments let's you get stronger and be your own kind of DoomBot, while the mission that ask for minimal augments are more of the "challenge and testing yourself" type of mission.
I never felt I had to "beg" to get some missions going. I just went in, asked nicely, and then we either did it for the mission or we went in and just played.
As for finding people to que up with, that is also not Riot's fault. Either find friends (if ya have any that play league) or just go in and hope for the best.
It really is that simple.
